subject: I await your immediate response
body:
Attention Mrs. Caroline.

Good morning, how are you doing today? I am wondering if you received  my
email dated 8/01/2024? I was waiting for you to re-confirm your details
like I requested so as to enable us to file in for your payment approval
from the concerned office to enhance the release of your payment. Please
update me as soon as possible.
Thanks,
Mrs, Elizabeth Johnson
